lead_paragraph: Longtime TNT broadcaster Craig Sager was remembered for his love of family, sports and colorful attire at a memorial service Tuesday that produced laughs and tears.

headline.print_headline: Sager Remembered for Love of Family, Sports, Flashy Attire
headline.main: Sager Remembered for Love of Family, Sports, Flashy Attire
